mapper.select: select distinct ELEMENT_SERIAL_SEQ from PDSCI.EDC_PATIENT_VISIT_DATA where PATIENT_FLOW=#{patientFlow} and VISIT_FLOW=#{visitFlow} and RECORD_STATUS='Y' order by ELEMENT_SERIAL_SEQ
SELECT DISTINCT ATTR_VALUE FROM PDSCI.EDC_PATIENT_VISIT_DATA WHERE PROJ_FLOW = #{projFlow} AND ATTR_VALUE IS NOT NULL AND ATTR_CODE = #{attrCode} AND RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ${attrValue}
